document_data.name: Ancient Ones
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ancient Ones''' were believed to be supernatural beings of great power by the [[Nexalan]]s, but they were actually [[drow]].
document_data.History:
The Ancients lived in the [[Highcave]] at the summit of [[Zaltec]]'s sacred volcano, [[Mount Zatal]]. Like many drow, they could not stand direct sunlight and thus only operated in darkness. They were capable of practicing powerful [[Hishna]] magic. Their duties included feeding Zaltec's [[Darkfyre]] and advising the high priest of [[Nexal]].<ref>

[[Lolth]] turned the Ancient Ones into [[drider]]s during the [[Night of Wailing]] as punishment for their lack of faith in her.<ref>
